name: supposeso
description: This adds a cookie consent banner\* on every page until the user gives some sort of consent.

scripts.development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js; drush cc css-js
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --no-progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js; drush cc css-js
